item.title: Everything You Need To Know About Rachel House, A Minecraft Movie's Malgosha Actor
item.description: A Minecraft Movie introduced the villain Malgosha. Rachel House, who is known for several big Taika Waititi movies, lends this character her voice.

item.title: Are Disneyland's Star Wars Nites Worth It? I Went So Here's Everything You Want To Know
item.description: Disneyland is holding its annual Star Wars Nites during Season of the Force...but are they actually worth it? I went, and here's what I discovered.

item.description: Jim Carrey's The Mask technically has 2 sequels - an animated series and the live-action Son of the Mask movie. However, one has a 6% score on RT.
